review.reviewBody: Amateur packing in NZ, with boxes mislabelled and items crudely wrapped. Awful communication, split delivery and missing boxes.  Manifest description did not match items delivered so we have no easy way to know what’s disappeared.  The NZ packers were barely literate and for all we know helped themselves to small items -  Grace can’t prove they didn’t because they have no detailed item list.   This company has the contract with WA Education for removals but clearly doesn’t value the role they play in facilitating teachers and their families to move seamlessly to hard to staff regional areas.  The insurance promises are worthless if there is no reliable item list, and once the moving process with Grace is started there appears to be little sincere chance of timely recovery or replacement of missing or damaged goods.  I will never use you again and will vocally tell others not to relocate with Grace.  A generic “we’re sorry” electronic reply to this post will not satisfy me or my family that your company truly cares. Plenty of those company responses on line….  Don’t offer a service if you can’t deliver robustly.

Everything happen as planned. Your guys were friendly and communicative. Nothing was damaged.
Great experience from my point of view.
Nice guys to work with. All  go.Very happy
Great, the crew on pickup were efficient and friendly. On drop off (even with a covid related hiccup) the crew was excellent
Tony was excellent. The foreman on the job was good too.
